GetRow.name: GetRow
GetRow.description: Get the number of the row for the selected cell.

GetCol.name: GetCol
GetCol.description: Get the number of the column for the selected cell.

GetRows.name: GetRows
GetRows.description: Returns a Range object that represents the rows in the specified range.

SetValue.name: SetValue
SetValue.description: Set the value for the current cell or a cell range.

params.name: value
params.description: The general value for the cell or cell range in string format.

SetFontColor.name: SetFontColor
SetFontColor.description: Set the text color for the current cell range with the previously created color object.

params.name: color
params.description: The color object previously created to set the color to the text in the cell/cell range.

SetFontSize.name: SetFontSize
SetFontSize.description: Set the font size for the characters of the current cell range.

params.name: size
params.description: The font size value measured in points.

SetFontName.name: SetFontName
SetFontName.description: Set the specified font family as the font name for the current cell range.

params.name: name
params.description: The font family name used for the current cell range.

SetAlignVertical.name: SetAlignVertical
SetAlignVertical.description: Set the vertical alignment of the text in the current cell range.

params.name: value
params.description: The parameters will define the vertical alignment that will be applied to the cell contents.

SetAlignHorizontal.name: SetAlignHorizontal
SetAlignHorizontal.description: Set the horizontal alignment of the text in the current cell range.

params.name: value
params.description: Set the horizontal alignment of the text in the current cell range.

SetBold.name: SetBold
SetBold.description: Set the bold property to the text characters in the current cell or cell range.

params.name: value
params.description: Specifies that the contents of this cell/cell range are displayed bold.

SetItalic.name: SetItalic
SetItalic.description: Set the italic property to the text characters in the current cell or cell range.

params.name: value
params.description: Specifies that the contents of this cell/cell range are displayed italicized.

SetUnderline.name: SetUnderline
SetUnderline.description: Specify that the contents of this cell/cell range are displayed along with a line appearing directly below the character.

params.name: value
params.description: Specifies the type of the line displayed under the characters. The following values are available: * "none" - for no underlining; * "single" - for the single line underlining the cell contents; * "singleAccounting" - for the single line underlining the cell contents but not protruding beyond the cell borders; * "double" - for the double line underlining the cell contents; * "doubleAccounting" - for the double line underlining the cell contents but not protruding beyond the cell borders.

SetStrikeout.name: SetStrikeout
SetStrikeout.description: Specify that the contents of the cell/cell range are displayed with a single horizontal line through the center of the line.

params.name: value
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current cell/cell range are displayed struck through.

SetWrap.name: SetWrap
SetWrap.description: Specifies whether the words in the cell must be wrapped to fit the cell size or not.

params.name: value
params.description: When set to true the words in the cell will be wrapped to fit the cell size.

SetFillColor.name: SetFillColor
SetFillColor.description: Set the background color for the current cell range with the previously created color object.

params.name: color
params.description: The color object previously created to set the color to the background in the cell/cell range.

SetNumberFormat.name: SetNumberFormat
SetNumberFormat.description: Specifies whether the number in the cell should be treated like number, currency, date, time, etc. or just like text.

params.name: value
params.description: Specifies the mask applied to the number in the cell.

SetBorders.name: SetBorders
SetBorders.description: Set the border to the cell/cell range with the parameters specified.

params.name: lineStyle
params.description: Specifies the line style used to form the cell border.

params.name: color
params.description: The color object previously created to set the color to the cell border.

Merge.name: Merge
Merge.description: Merge the selected cell range into a single cell or a cell row.

params.name: across
params.description: When set to true, the cells within the selected range will be merged along the rows, but remain split in the columns. When set to false, the whole selected range of cells will be merged into a single cell.

UnMerge.name: UnMerge
UnMerge.description: Split the selected merged cell range into single cells.

ForEach.name: ForEach
ForEach.description: The ForEach() method executes a provided function once for each cell

AddComment.name: AddComment
AddComment.description: Adds a comment to the range.

GetWorksheet.name: GetWorksheet
GetWorksheet.description: Returns a Worksheet object that represents the worksheet containing the specified range. Read-only.
